items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: "HelioSpace is a lightweight 3D solar system simulator using Three.js, featuring Mercury, Venus, Earth (with its Moon), and Mars with Phobos/Deimos. Realistic textures, orbital mechanics, and dynamic sunlight bring these inner planets to life, while camera controls enable smooth exploration. Built as a modular foundation for astronomy visualization

Realistic textures, orbital mechanics, and dynamic sunlight bring these inner planets to life, while camera controls enable smooth exploration. Built as a modular foundation for astronomy visualization

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more.
